channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: アトランティック紙が著名な寄稿者ヤッシャ・マウンク氏との関係を断ち切った。
item.description:
Washington Post:
The Atlantic cuts ties with prominent contributor Yascha Mounk after writer Celeste Marcus accused him of rape; Mounk calls the claims “categorically untrue”  —  The Atlantic magazine has cut ties with writer Yascha Mounk, one of its prominent contributors, after a woman accused him of rape …

item.title: スポティファイ、第4四半期の売上高は前年同期比16％増の37億ユーロ、MAUは同23％増の6億200万人、加入者数は同15％増の2億3600万人、営業損失は7500万ユーロ、2024年第1四半期のMAUは6億1800万人を見込む（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Spotify reports Q4 revenue up 16% YoY to €3.7B, MAUs up 23% YoY to 602M, subscribers up 15% YoY to 236M, a €75M operating loss, and expects 618M MAUs in Q1 2024  —  - Spotify posts second-largest gain ever for the quarter  — Company has been cutting costs in drive to become profitable

item.title: 情報筋Redditの2023年の売上は8億ドル超、前年比20％以上増、通期では黒字にならず、第4四半期は黒字だったとの情報も（Amy Or/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Amy Or / Bloomberg:
Sources: Reddit had over $800M in revenue in 2023, up 20%+ YoY, and was not profitable for the full year; a source says Reddit was profitable in Q4  —  - Social site posted over $800 million revenue last year  — Reddit may reveal public IPO filing as soon as this month

item.title: 黒人に焦点を当てた非営利ニュースメディア「Capital B Gary」の編集者、ジャヴォンテ・アンダーソン氏とのQ&A：地元の人々との協力、ユーザー調査による報道の形成などについて（Will Fischer/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Will Fischer / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with Javonte Anderson, editor of Capital B Gary, a Black-focused nonprofit news outlet, on working with locals, shaping coverage via user surveys, and more  —  “We want to meet the people where they're at, whether that's churches, neighborhood block clubs, salons, or barber shops.”

item.title: ランセット誌の政治的主張、商業的成功が物議を醸す決定を下す自由を与えたことなどについて、リチャード・ホートン編集長にインタビュー（Clive Cookson/Financial Times紙）
item.description:
Clive Cookson / Financial Times:
An interview with editor Richard Horton about The Lancet's political advocacy, commercial success giving him the freedom to make controversial decisions, more  —  Veteran editor says commercial success has given him the freedom to make controversial decisions

item.title: 米連邦判事は、グーグルの広告事業に対する司法省と複数の州による反トラスト法訴訟の裁判開始日を2024年9月9日に設定（Mike Scarcella/Reuters）
item.description:
Mike Scarcella / Reuters:
A US federal judge sets the trial for the DOJ's and multiple states' antitrust lawsuit against Google's ad business to begin on September 9, 2024  —  A U.S. federal judge on Monday set a Sept. 9, 2024, date for the start of a jury trial in a lawsuit the U.S. Justice Department and a coalition …

item.title: 米判事は、WBDが2022年の合併前にHBO Maxのストリーミング契約者数を過大評価していなかったと認め、投資家からの集団訴訟案を棄却した（Jonathan Stempel/Reuters）
item.description:
Jonathan Stempel / Reuters:
A US judge finds WBD didn't overstate HBO Max streaming subscriber numbers prior to its 2022 merger and dismisses a proposed class action lawsuit from investors  —  Warner Bros Discovery (WBD.O) on Monday won the dismissal of a proposed class action led by Ohio Attorney General Dave Yost …

item.title: ニールセン：第66回グラミー賞の視聴者数は、CBS、Paramount+、CBS.com、CBSアプリで前年比34％増の平均1,690万人、Paramount+のストリーミングは前年比173％増（Selome Hailu/Variety）
item.description:
Selome Hailu / Variety:
Nielsen: the 66th annual Grammys hit an average 16.9M viewers, up 34% YoY, across CBS, Paramount+, CBS.com, and the CBS app; Paramount+ streams were up 173% YoY  —  The 66th annual Grammy Awards took a fast car towards ratings success on Sunday, bringing in an average 16.9 million viewers …

item.title: 正確さを重視し、知識中心のプラットフォームとして際立っていたQuoraだが、今ではAIが生成した奇妙なエントリで埋め尽くされている（Nitish Pahwa/Slate）
item.description:
Nitish Pahwa / Slate:
A look at the decline of Quora, which used to stand out as an accuracy-focused, knowledge-centric platform but is now filled with bizarre, AI-generated entries  —  The site used to be a thriving community that worked to answer our most specific questions.  But users are fleeing.

item.title: 先週の決算では、メタの広告売上高が前年同期比24％増、アマゾンの広告事業が27％増、グーグルの広告事業が11％増と、広告市場好転の兆しが見られた（ジョナサン・バニアン/CNBC）。
item.description:
Jonathan Vanian / CNBC:
Last week's earnings showed signs of an ad market turnaround, with Meta's ad sales up 24% YoY, Amazon's ad business growing 27%, and Google's ad business up 11%  —  - The digital advertising market appears to be on the upswing based on quarterly results last week from Alphabet, Meta and Amazon.

item.title: ポリティコ、英総選挙を前に6人のロンドン・プレイブック・ニュースレター・チームを再編成、ポリティコの英国スタッフは2022年12月以来3倍に増加（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Politico reshuffles its six-strong London Playbook newsletters team ahead of an expected UK general election; Politico's UK staff has grown 3x since Dec. 2022  —  Politico has more than tripled its London staffing since December 2022.  —  Politico has reshuffled the six-strong team writing …

item.title: ディアボーン市長は、ミシガン州の都市を "アメリカのジハードの首都 "と評したWSJのオピニオン記事の "直接の結果 "として、警察の存在感を高めたと語っている（Politico）。
item.description:
Politico:
Mayor of Dearborn says police increased their presence as a “direct result” of a WSJ opinion piece that described the Michigan city as “America's jihad capital”  —  The move is in response to a Wall Street Journal opinion piece.  —  DEARBORN, Mich. — Dearborn …

item.title: マイクロソフト、クレイグ・ニューマーク・ジャーナリズムスクール、オンラインニュース協会、GroundTruth Project、NotaとのAI提携を発表（Noreen Gillespie/Microsoft On the Issues）
item.description:
Noreen Gillespie / Microsoft On the Issues:
Microsoft announces AI partnerships with the Craig Newmark School of Journalism, the Online News Association, the GroundTruth Project, and Nota  —  What will the newsroom of the future look like?  —  Today, Microsoft is launching several collaborations with news organizations to adopt generative AI.

item.title: メモCNNが朝のスケジュールを見直し、ニュース・セントラルを午前7時（東部標準時）に繰り上げる。
item.description:
Lachlan Cartwright / The Hollywood Reporter:
Memo: CNN revamps its morning schedule, moving up News Central to 7am ET; This Morning moves to Atlanta, Phil Mattingly and Poppy Harlow will move to new roles  —  The show's 50-person team have been told they can reapply for jobs within the network, according to the people familiar.

item.title: ユーロビジョンの主催者である欧州放送連合が、公共放送の中継を補完する無料ストリーミングサービス「Eurovision Sport」を開始（K.J. Yossman/Variety）
item.description:
K.J. Yossman / Variety:
Eurovision organizer European Broadcasting Union launches Eurovision Sport, a free streaming service to complement public service broadcasters' coverage  —  A free direct-to-consumer service offering thousands of hours live sports broadcasting, the streamer is available for desktop, mobile and both ioS and Android apps.
